title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 14-1.120 - Water supply
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 14-1.120 - Water supply

State Regulations

The water supply is to be adequate, safe, and of sanitary quality from an acceptable source that meets the requirements of Part 5 of this Title. Use of water supply requires prior approval from the permit-issuing official. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
14-1.120

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
